mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume (m_idx,r_self, r_pos, r_skill, r_file, r_refile, r_link,r_gradestart,r_gradeend,r_gradecom,r_sta,r_status,r_ldate) VALUES (#{m_idx}, #{r_self}, #{r_pos}, #{r_skill}, #{r_file}, #{r_refile}, #{r_link}, #{r_gradestart}, #{r_gradeend}, #{r_gradecom},#{r_sta},#{r_status},now())
insert into re_lic (m_idx, r_licdate, r_licname) values (#{m_idx},#{r_licdate},#{r_licname})
insert into re_car (m_idx, r_carstartdate , r_carenddate , r_company , r_department, r_position) values (#{m_idx},#{r_carstartdate},#{r_carenddate},#{r_company},#{r_department},#{r_position})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, l.*, c.* FROM resume r LEFT JOIN re_lic l ON r.m_idx = l.m_idx LEFT JOIN re_car c ON r.m_idx = c.m_idx WHERE r.m_idx = #{m_idx}
SELECT m.m_nickname FROM resume rs JOIN member m ON rs.m_idx = m.m_idx WHERE rs.m_idx = #{m_idx}
SELECT m.m_photo FROM resume rs JOIN member m ON rs.m_idx = m.m_idx WHERE rs.m_idx = #{m_idx}
select * from resume where r_status=1 order by m_idx desc limit #{start},#{perpage}
